attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is an archaic rule, it takes away the freedom of choice and breaks fare competition rules. TV's are used for so much more than just watching BBC programs, that it is criminal that every person in the UK has to pay for a service they may not even use.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
